name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup kalamata olives, pitted and halved
steps:
Rinse quinoa thoroughly under cold water until water runs clear.
Cook quinoa in water or vegetable broth according to package instructions (usually 15-20 minutes).
Once cooked, fluff quinoa with a fork and spread on a baking sheet to cool completely.
While quinoa cools, prepare vegetables: halve cherry tomatoes, dice cucumber, and finely dice red onion.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, red wine vinegar, minced garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper to create the dressing.
Transfer cooled quinoa to a large salad bowl.
Add tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and olives to the quinoa.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.
Add crumbled feta cheese and fresh herbs (parsley and mint).
Toss once more and adjust seasoning if needed.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
Serve chilled or at room temperature as a side dish or light main course.
